summary:
The Security Council,

Noting with regret Judge Awn Shawkat Al-Khasawneh's resignation, effective 31 December 2011,

Noting a vacancy occurred in the International Court of Justice for the remainder of his term,

Noting the vacancy must be filled according to the Court's Statute,

Noting article 14 of the Statute requires the Security Council to fix the date of the election to fill the vacancy,

Decides the election to fill the vacancy will take place on 27 April 2012 at a meeting of the Security Council and the General Assembly's sixty-sixth session.
